page.title: 12Garage facilities.
page.content: Bordering on the southern side of the A.35 road and at the top of Chideock hill there is the only garage and service station within the area of our survey. This is Frodsham motors and it is owned and managed by Mr. and Mrs.Frodsham. There is a large repair shop for vehicles and outside there are three fuel supply pumps 2 for petrol and one deisel. The pumps are protected overhead by a canopy and are not "self_Service". An office /shop abuts onto the main building. In addition to normal workshop facilities, including an M.O.T. Testing bay, the garage operates a nationwide recovery service for light and heavy vehicles.
